statements: DELETE FROM transportation_data WHERE incident_type = 'Accident' AND disruption_reason = 'Road closure';
DELETE FROM transportation_data WHERE id = 100 AND incident_type = 'Accident';
DELETE FROM transportation_data WHERE delay_duration > INTERVAL '1 hour' AND disruption_reason LIKE '%traffic%';
DELETE FROM delays WHERE id = 100 AND delay_reason = 'Traffic congestion';
DELETE FROM incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Accident' AND incident_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM disruptions WHERE disruption_cause = 'Technical Issue';
DELETE FROM delays WHERE delay_minutes > 60 AND delay_reason = 'Accident';
DELETE FROM disruptions WHERE disruption_date < '2022-01-01' AND disruption_reason LIKE '%technical issues%';
